verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [V: defended] [ARG1: his summit meeting Kim Jong - un and his statements vouching for the North Korean dictator 's love of his people] .
President Donald Trump on Friday defended his summit meeting Kim Jong - un and [ARG0: his statements] [V: vouching] [ARG1: for the North Korean dictator 's love of his people] .
